page.title: 20Scremerston:Credits etc.
page.content: This survey was compiled by all the staff and children of{Scremerston {County First School. The slides were taken by {Mrs.H.Langford,}teacher at the school. Children in Class 1 who took part were:R.Brown,P.Duguid,D.Smith,H.Sore. L.Cormack,J.Swanston,M.Anderson,J.Carr L.Raine,L.Wetherley,C and D.Emery, S.Duff,S.Smith,L.Scott,A.Frater, R.Parker,R.Plater,A.Clennell,L.Dalton L.A.Fife,J.Miller,L.Dalgarno, L.Griffiths,E.Edwards and K.Lauder. Children in Class 2 were:C.& R.Dods C.O'Neill,C.Parker,B.Wright,S.Blackie W.Frater,D.Lauder,J.Ingledew,A.Rivers, L.Godsell,M.Smith,S.Campbell,C.Fife, K.A.Thompson.
